backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that fetches metal prices from IBJA URL via HTTP outcalls every 5 minutes using a recurring timer, with a transform function for processing responses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features: displaying gold prices per 10g, silver prices per kg, and automatic price updates without manual refresh.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components for live rates, product displays, contact forms, and hooks for fetching metal prices with GST calculations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with custom theme tokens for backgrounds, foregrounds, and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Silver Gold Refinery', and root div mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component composing all sections including MetalTicker, FloatingCallButton, HeroSection, LiveRatesDashboard, ProductsSection, ContactSection, SocialMediaAssets, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with WhatsApp integration displaying phone number 9518553890, featuring a call-to-action button and refinery interior background image.
frontend/src/components/FloatingCallButt: Draggable floating call button that dials +919518553890 via tel: link, distinguishes clicks from drags using 5px threshold, and persists position in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice and 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link with UTM tracking parameters based on hostname.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with furnace background image, gradient overlay, white text with drop shadows, animated sparkle icon, and staggered fade-in animations for heading and description.
frontend/src/components/LiveRatesDashboa: Displays live gold and silver prices in a dashboard with cards showing current rates, changes, GST calculations, and market status (open/closed). Includes loading skeletons and error states with Indian number formatting.
frontend/src/components/MetalTicker.tsx: A scrolling ticker component that displays live gold and silver prices with trend indicators and market status badges (LIVE/CLOSED). Updates market status every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: A memoized card component displaying product details (title, image, purity levels, formats) for gold or silver products with hover effects and color-coded badges.
Section showcasing silver and gold products with their purity levels and formats, plus refinery process images with overlay descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaAsset: Displays and provides download functionality for Instagram promotional materials (1080x1080px sponsorship post) for gold and silver rates.
frontend/src/config/api.ts: API configuration defining backend fetch interval (300s) and timeout (10s) for metal prices endpoint.
frontend/src/config/fallback.ts: Defines fallback prices for gold (₹159,000/10g) and silver (₹265,000/kg) based on Kolkata rates, plus price variation constants for simulation.
frontend/src/config/refresh.ts: Configuration for automatic price updates including refetch interval (5 min), stale time (4 min), retry logic, and background refetch settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMetalPrices.ts: Empty file placeholder for metal prices hook functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook for fetching metal prices with GST calculations, market status detection (weekend/inactivity), and fallback prices; currently uses hardcoded fallback data pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system for light/dark modes, metallic theme colors (gold/silver), and custom animations including MCX-style ticker scrolling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/types/ibja.ts: TypeScript type definitions for IBJA rates data structure and metal price objects including GST fields and price change tracking.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with OKLCH color variables, custom gold/silver colors, shadows, animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests for displaying live gold/silver prices in INR for Kolkata with 5-minute auto-refresh, including architectural notes and pending requirements.
